phrases: You are to light the lanterns hidden in the forest around us.
They are within 500 meter radius around the camp.
Those who can bring back a lit lantern without the fire going out during the next three days
will receive the permission to take part in missions.
However, there are only three lanterns.
Which means that there are only three permissions.
We are in a dark forest.
You will be found out right away.
I am telling you not to use your flames.
This training is designed to turn us against each other.
There is so many of them!
I humbly call upon the Gods of Harvest!
Follow my wishes, leave none unfulfilled!
Ni, give me something for bug repellent!
He says he found a lantern.
He says it is impossible alone, we have got to work together.
You were right, this is impossible alone.
When I saw it, I thought maybe we had misinterpreted the mission...
Which planet are you from, Okumura?
Bow to the floor to the Holy Unmovable, the Raging Destroyer King...
Now this is one less thing to worry about.
I will deal with this and catch up with you!
Of course we will help you!
Oh great and mighty Unmovable Wise, crush all hesitation.
This is all I can do!
It is not chasing us anymore.
I was just returning the favor.
You said you wanted to defeat Satan just like me,
Well I am stupid so I do not really think about that kind of stuff.
But stop trying to solve everything by yourself!
Do not forget that you are not alone!
I will help you, even though I cannot do much.
As long as it does not involve more bugs.
Rin, we are here for you.
But Shima was totally useless this time.
What if they knew that I am the son of Satan?
Hurray, we are all back alive!
You are still in one piece.
I made my familiars do it.
You took so long with so many people?
Just what is he made of?
Then who shot up the fireworks earlier?
Do not just stand there with your jaws on the floor!
I thought I would have a nice cup of tea while I watch the show,
but this is even better than I expected.
This will not be so easy, Amaimon.
If you try to kill any of them, I will kill you.
It protects everyone inside the circle and attacks everything outside.
For the time being we are safe inside it.
Professor, is this training as well?
Are not this a bit too tough for that!
Now we are going to prepare for Amaimon's attacks.
One of the Eight Princes of Hell, the Earth King?
He is a big fish, so big you Esquires will not be able to land even a scratch on him.
I will soak you in triple-C holy water for extra protection.
It would not be a pretty sight if I soaked you.
In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
Okay, this will protect you somewhat until you dry.
You are not doing it to Okumura?
He is, lessee... allergic to holy water.
By the way, where is Yukio?
He was in the way so I sent him away.
The demon bugs of this forest are supposed to be bound to Tamers.
Why is there an emergency number if no one picks up?
I cannot contact the other teachers either.
Why is a big one like Amaimon attacking us?
I do not know know why, but he is probably after me.
Do not worry, this barrier should hold against even Amaimon.
But it looks like he is got some kind of plan this time.
The next time he attacks you will leave here with the Demon-Slaying Blade.
I bow down to beg your permission.
Were not you going on about how you wanted it back?
And were not you supposed to suppress my power?
You told me not to use my flames!
but you went and used them anyway, did not you?
The point is, how are you going to fight without your flames?
Amaimon is the King of Earth, he are not a little imp like the ones you have fought so far.
What did you do to her?
I just made a demon bug lay her egg in her.
It took a while for it to hatch and connect to the nerves though.
But now she will do whatever I command.
You are staying in there no matter what happens!
What the hell do you want from me?
What do you need Shiemi for?
I will make her my wife!
Do you promise to be faithful to me in good times and in bad,
Will you love me and honor me
all the days of your life?
Then seal this covenant with a kiss.
Why will not you draw your sword?
Wait, she told us to stay here!
Man, it is been a while since the last time I was pissed off this badly.
Wipe your ass with that calm down!
Why am I surrounded by nothing but idiots?
Was not this girl important to you?
Why are not you taking this seriously?
Then I do not need her anymore.
I could take one of her eyes as a souvenir.
One of our cousins has this hobby of collecting human eyeballs, he asked me to bring him some.
Why are you leaving us out of the fun?
Get out of there if you have a chance!
I am here to save Moriyama.
Koneko, what are you trying to do to Moriyama?
I have got no business with you.
Okumura's the one who is pissing me off!
You act all random, then you save a person...
You have no talent, then you save the day...
I do not like to be ignored.
I will help you, even though I cannot do much.
Rin, we are here for you.
Do not forget that you are not alone!
Guys... you were all so kind to me...
I am not good at lying and tricking people.
I will use my power for a gentler purpose!
That is a demon sword... the Kurikara.
Tail is one of the weakest points a demon has.
An educated demon would know better and keep it hidden.
You still have loads to learn.
Let us get out of here, it is too dangerous.
You wanted me to take care of this beast, Shiro?
I am looking forward to it.
Compared to demons who always seek the pleasure in denial,
the moderate ways of humans are easy to corrupt.
So, which way are you taking?
I did not think he could overwhelm Amaimon like this.
He is totally lost control of his flames.
What a handful you are, my little brother.
It is blue, no matter how I look at it.
That demon there is the son of Satan?
I will execute the offspring of Satan!
Now I am sure it is impossible to clear this training alone.
Now I am sure it is impossible to clear this training alone.
Now I am sure it is impossible to clear this training alone.
Episode 15 szia An Act of Kindness
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
